name: Beats n' Tonic
description:
Go on a tasty adventure between music, robots and two shots of oil. Enjoy the ever permanent fear of being killed by robots! And much more!

Congrats! You survived the robot apocalypse! However, as payment for your life you have to spend the rest of your days making drinks for robots and it turns out their taste in drinks is... quite unique to say the least.

Add the right ingredients to the drink in sync with the rhythm and jam to the robot jazz. Use the number keys or a midi device to input and mix the drinks! But be careful not to mess it up.  After three wrong drinks your tasty life is over and the robots replace you.

  • Lead Developer: Damian Schneider
  • Developer: Bahy Nguyen, Alina Fetoski
  • VFX: Bahy Nguyen
  • Audio: Chris Kohler
  • Art & Game Concept: Alina Fetoski
  • Drink Names: Tobias Grasberger
